trans-unit.source: Represents a linear collection of elements in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 요소의 선형 컬렉션을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewBand class represents <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> elements joined together in a band that can be manipulated as a group.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewBand 클래스 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>요소 그룹으로 조작할 수 있는 메시지 상자에서 함께 조인.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Each element is typically an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> or one of its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 각 요소는 일반적으로 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>또는 해당 파생된 클래스 중 하나입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> is associated with each band, header cells are not considered elements of the band.
trans-unit.target: 하지만 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>연결 된 머리글 셀 각 밴드에는 밴드의 요소를 고려 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: DataGridViewBand is the base class of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> classes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewBand는의 기본 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: There are no public constructors for the DataGridViewBand type, so the only way to access a band is through columns and rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewBand 형식에는 공용 생성자 있으므로 밴드에 액세스 하는 유일한 방법은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 의 열과 행을 통해

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this band.
trans-unit.target: 이 밴드의 정확한 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a row or column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 행 또는 셀의 열을 복제 하는이 방법을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복제 된 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the band.
trans-unit.target: 밴드에 대 한 바로 가기 메뉴를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu appears when a user clicks the right mouse button in the band's display area.
trans-unit.target: 바로 가기 메뉴는 밴드의 표시 영역에서 마우스 오른쪽 단추를 클릭할 때 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: The display area is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 표시 영역은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> 현재와 관련 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style of the band.
trans-unit.target: 밴드의 기본 셀 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default cell style is applied to cells that do not have an associated style.
trans-unit.target: 기본 셀 스타일은 연결된 된 스타일이 갖지 않는 셀에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the default cell style does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 가져올 때 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>이며 기본값은 값이 생성 됩니다 기본 셀 스타일 존재 하지 않는 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 연관 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the run-time type of the default header cell.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 유형의 기본 머리글 셀을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property must get or set an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> class or one of its derived types.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 가져오거나 인스턴스를 설정 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>클래스 또는 파생된 형식 중 하나입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> as the default header cell type.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>클래스에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>기본 머리글 셀 형식으로.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로,는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>클래스에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: If you are using a custom type derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> in a row or column, the DefaultHeaderCellType property must be set to the custom type.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 사용자 지정 형식을 사용 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>행 이나 열에 DefaultHeaderCellType 속성을 사용자 지정 형식으로 설정 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that describes the run-time class of the object used as the default header cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>기본 머리글 셀으로 사용 되는 개체의 런타임 클래스를 설명 하는.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a <xref:System.Type> representing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> or a derived type.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 값이이 속성을 설정 하지는 <xref:System.Type>나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> 또는 파생된 형식입니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the band is currently displayed onscreen.
trans-unit.target: 밴드 현재 화면에 나타나는 표시 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band is currently onscreen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>밴드가; 현재 화면에 표시 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면 Dispose를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>불안정 한 상태가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출한 후에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>차지한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에 항상 호출 삭제

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 public `Dispose()` 메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>호출 `Dispose` 와 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수가 true 이면이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources associated with the band.
trans-unit.target: 밴드와 관련 된 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 재정의 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 코드,이 메서드를 호출 하지 않아야 개체의 `Finalize` 메서드를 호출 하 여 가비지 수집기의 종료를 사용 하지 않도록 설정 된 경우가 아니면 자동으로 가비지 수집 중 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Finalize 메서드 및 소멸자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), 및 [Finalize 메서드를 재정의](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)합니다.

trans-unit.source: When called by the garbage collector, this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 가비지 수집기에서 호출 되 면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Dispose%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band will move when a user scrolls through the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자에 의해 스크롤될 때 밴드를 이동 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property can hold a band of important information in place when a user scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 를 스크롤할 때이 속성에에서 중요 한 정보의 밴드 보유할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Bands adjacent to the frozen band will move over the frozen band.
trans-unit.target: 고정 된 대역 외에 인접 한 밴드는 고정된 된 밴드를 통해 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band cannot be scrolled from view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>밴드; 보기에서 스크롤할 수 없는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property has been set.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>속성이 설정 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property automatically instantiates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> if the property has not previously been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 값을 가져오는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성이 자동으로 새 인스턴스화합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>속성에 이전에 액세스 하지 않은 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must, therefore, use the HasDefaultCellStyle property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property is currently set to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> instance.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 HasDefaultCellStyle 속성을 사용 하 여 확인 하려면 해야 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>현재 속성이로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.InheritedStyle%2A> property represent styles set specifically for the band.
trans-unit.target: 이 반환 하는 개체의 속성을 확인 하는 데 유용는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.InheritedStyle%2A>속성 밴드에 대해 따로 설정 하는 스타일을 나타내는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 셀 스타일 상속 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 셀 스타일](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>속성이 설정 된 그렇지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 머리글 셀을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> representing the header cell of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> 의 머리글 셀을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> instance is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 값이이 속성을 설정 하지는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> 형식의 인스턴스가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> instance is of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -또는-지정 된 값이이 속성을 설정할 때이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> 형식의 인스턴스가 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative position of the band within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 밴드의 상대 위치를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the band within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값 컬렉션 내에서 밴드의 현재 위치에 반드시 일치 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user reorders columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> at run time (assuming the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A> property is set to `true`), the value of the Index property of each column will not change.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 사용자의 열 순서를 재정렬 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>실행 시 (가정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`), 각 열의 인덱스 속성의 값이 변경 되지 것입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> values change.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 열의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>값이 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sorting rows, however, does change their Index values.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 행을 정렬 하는 인덱스 값 변경지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the band in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref> that it is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 밴드의&0;부터 시작 위치는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> 내에 포함 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, indicating that there is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은-1, 더 연결 중임을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style in effect for the current band, taking into account style inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 적용 스타일 상속을 고려 하 여 현재 밴드에 대 한 셀 스타일을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> class always returns `null` because this base class cannot contain elements.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>클래스는 항상 반환 `null` 이 기본 클래스 요소를 포함할 수 없기 때문입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>

trans-unit.source: For more information about style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 스타일 상속 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 셀 스타일](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 연관 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the band represents a row.
trans-unit.target: 밴드 행을 나타내는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>밴드를 나타내는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the band is associated with a different <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 밴드 다른 연결 될 때 호출 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the band's cells.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 밴드의 셀을 편집할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly property affects the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each cell in the band.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 속성 영향을 줌은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>밴드의 각 셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ReadOnly property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> changes, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of all cells in the row will change.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우의 ReadOnly 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>변경 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>행의 모든 셀의 속성 변경 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the band's cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>밴드의 셀을 편집할 수 없습니다 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref> instance is a shared <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때이 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref> 인스턴스는 공유 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band can be resized in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)에서 밴드의 크기를 조정할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can prevent users from resizing individual rows or columns by setting their Resizable properties.
trans-unit.target: 크기 조정 가능한 해당 속성을 설정 하 여 개별 행 이나 열 크기 조정에서 사용자가 방지할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the Resizable property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A> property value for columns and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A> property value for rows.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 크기를 조정할 수 속성 값에 따라는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A>열에 대 한 속성 값 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A>행에 대 한 속성 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, however, the control value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 크기 조정 가능을 명시적으로 설정 하면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, 컨트롤 값이 무시 되는 반면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> to restore the inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 크기 조정 가능으로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>여 상속을 복원 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> restores the value inheritance, the Resizable property will never return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> value unless the row or column has not been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>복원 값 상속을 크기 조정 가능한 속성을 반환 하지 것입니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>행 또는 열이 추가 되지 않는에 값을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine whether the Resizable property value of a row or column is inherited, check its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 행 또는 열의 크기를 조정할 수 속성 값이 상속 하는지 여부를 결정 해야 하는 경우 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> flag, the Resizable property value is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>값에 포함 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>플래그를 크기 조정 가능한 속성 값은 상속 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Resizable property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, the user will not be able to manually adjust band size.
trans-unit.target: 크기를 조정할 수 속성 값이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, 사용자 수동으로 밴드의 크기를 조정할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band is in a selected user interface (UI) state.
trans-unit.target: 밴드 선택 된 사용자 인터페이스 (UI) 상태 인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property enabled is associated with the band.
trans-unit.target: 경우에이 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>와 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>밴드와 연결 된 속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>밴드 선택 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, but the band has not been added to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때 지정 된 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 밴드에 추가 되지 않은 있지만 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- This property is being set on a shared <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -또는-이 속성을 설정 하는 공유에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data to associate with the band.
trans-unit.target: 밴드를 연결할 데이터를 포함 하는 개체를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Tag property can store any object that you want to associate with a band.
trans-unit.target: Tag 속성 밴드와 연결할 하는 모든 개체를 저장할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used to store identifying information, such as a string name, a unique identifier (for example, a <xref:System.Guid>), or the index of the band's data in a database.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 일반적으로 문자열 이름에는 고유 식별자와 같은 식별 정보를 저장 하는 데 사용 됩니다 (예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Guid>), 또는 데이터베이스의 밴드의 데이터의 인덱스입니다.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains information associated with the band.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>밴드와 관련 된 정보가 포함 된.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current band.
trans-unit.target: 현재 밴드를 나타내는 문자열을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 재정의 <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The returned string contains the class's name and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 문자열에는 클래스의 이름을 포함 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band is visible to the user.
trans-unit.target: 밴드 사용자에 게 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to hide extraneous columns or rows.
trans-unit.target: 불필요 한 열 이나 행을 숨기려면이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the band is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>밴드 표시 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the band is the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정할 때 지정 된 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 밴드는 새 레코드에 대 한 행입니다.
